Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
